comment._content: Eerie, but oddly peaceful at the same time.

comment.author: 47572660@N08
comment._content: Well, this is definitely Coledale, taken from the (still) winding section of road between Wombarra and Coledale. See my photo: www.flickr.com/photos/47572660@N08/4399368087/ which shows that the profile of the headland is the same.
